SourceProxy.name: TimeToTextConvertor
SourceProxy.label: Annotate Time Filter

Documentation.long_help: Shows input data time as text annnotation in the view.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Annotate Time filter can be used to show the data time in a text annotation.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input dataset for which to display the time.

StringVectorProperty.name: Format
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property is a format string used to display the input time. The format string is specified using printf style.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Shift
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The amount of time the input is shifted (after scaling).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Scale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The factor by which the input time is scaled.
